budu siritha, nohaka nodakinnata yanena maga samathanama apuru minisek gana satahan thabami mage mathakaye hatiyata ee 2002 wasarayi.palamuwarata krikat tharagayak narambaimata mata hakiwiya.ayiyala kawuruth nathi nisath thaththa krikat walata wadi kamaththak nathi nisath kuda kala mahata ape bhashawen kiyana ayurin mach ekak balanna chans ekak set wunema natha.namuth lada awasthawen hithe hatiyata balanna patan gathimi.mach nobaluwada ee dawaswala sita ada dakwa thibena mach pissuwa nisa kridakayange nam siyallakma pahe danagena sitiyemi.me athurin kihipa denek ma priyakala aya athara wiya.mulu tharagaya purawatama ma ek wishesha pudgalayek dutuwemi.lada mohothin ee gana satahanak melesa thabami.

"sahodarawaruni,sahodariyani.apage wibhuthimath athithaya sihipath karana mema awasthawata pamini oba siyalu dena sadarayen piliganimi.yam yam dewal tharamak mila adhika wi athi bawath,aahara mila pilibada oba masiwili nagamin inna bawath mama dannawa.namuth edesa melesa balana men mama illa sitimi.oba athurin miliyana hayasiya panahak dena jiwath wanuye gowin ha krushi kamkaruwan washayen krushikarmanthayeni.namuth obage eekabaddha dayakathwayen sanyuktha wanuye mulu jathika aadayamin 18% k pamani.ebawin oben athi prayojanaya kumakda?apage thorathuru thakshana kshethraya desa balanna.ehi sewa niyukthawa sitinuye janagahanayen 0.2% pamani.namuth jathika nishpadithaye 5% k samanwitha wanuye owunge nishpadanayangeni.obata ee ha samawennawath puluwanda ?apage rate aarthika wardhanayata samagamiwa rakiya uthpadanayak siduwa nathi bawa aththaki.namuth wasanawakata men apage shrama balakaye 60% pamana swayanrakiyawala yedennawun wethi.shrama balakaye 90% pamana sewaye yedi sitinuye asanwidhanathmaka anshayeya.owunta kirimata wada labenuye hudek masakata dina kihipayak pamanak bawa mama piliganimi.namuth uuna sewaniyukthiya yanuwen prawargayak apa haduna noganna nisa apata ee gana wadidura nowehesi sitimata puluwana.owun wirakshawen pelenawun washayen apage sankhya lekhana thula athulath kirima niwaradi natha.mebadu prashna apata pasuwa wisadagatha haka.apage "pahalata kandu wime wiplawaya" sampurna wuwata pasu,saukhya sewawan sampurnayenma paudgalikakaranayata lakwuwata pasu apata me gana sitha baliya haka.me athara oba siyalu dena saukhya rakshanayan miladi ganu athayi mama udakma apeksha karami.eekashirsha aahara surakshithathawaya pasugiya wasara 20 thula pahatha wati thibe yana karuna salakuwahoth - ee wasara wissa apage sighra aarthika wardhanaya siduwu kalayada wanneya - mawa wishwasa karanna,eya hudek ahambhayak pamani.
